channel.title: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free
channel.description:
*For Hundreds of years, bobbing craft full of Unfortunates have been brought to the Tower, keen to take on* '**The Voice**' *And its dark, magical forces. Challenges await them on every floor, and someone not to be trusted! But only one can win the 'Key of freedom'. And the rest? Well...*"
"**You're Trapped! Mwahahahaha...**"
**Game rules**
Up to 8 players will take part in tasks, with one player selected as a saboteur. The saboteur will be guided by 'The Voice' in Pms, and be tasked with ensuring the task is failed. **Saboteurs cannot talk to The Voice - only recieve orders from it!**
**Task outcomes**
If the Unfortunates complete a task, the Saboteur is automatically locked in the room - with the others advancing. Regardless of the result, players in order instructed by the Voice will be asked to vote for the Saboteur at the end of the game. **Other than when voting, players may not talk once a game ends** If the challenge was failed:- If the Saboteur recieves the most votes, they are 'Detected' and will be locked in the room If a normal unfortunate is voted, the Saboteur chooses any player, except someone who voted for them, and they are locked in the room If 2 or more players are tied for highest votes, as long as at least one is the saboteur, they will draw straws. The shortest is locked in the room.
**Fight for freedom**
**This game requires discord** The 2 remaining players will face a quickfire quiz about events in the Tower. Pay close attention...
*Cast*
*Caretaker* - He will comment from time to time and provide a tldr explaination to challenges **The Voice** - Will talk directly to the participants. Will be critical of saboteurs who don't try hard enough to sabotage challenges.
Sign ups
1) App 2) PKR 3) Wazza 4) The other App 5) 😂 Joy 6) Boss 7) Jane 8) Hipp

item.title: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Ok. I made a few changes from the original show. Like majority vote doesn’t just yeet the unfortunate person lol wagoned and having each player make choices. The latter didn’t work as I hoped…

Perilious presents

Summary

https://youtu.be/nZQCVJS4xdg
This clip is what that game was based on.

I was happy how this went. App did well to solve the game but Boss missed his window to disrupt discussion due to timezones. He did well otherwise.

Frozen Princess

Summary

https://youtu.be/SDKpjhCz_Bk
This episode features it at 7:15

Although @Wazza called this game BS, Apprentice did well to not stand out while using the trigger word. Easy enough to sabotage, harder to get away with though.

Lost Invitations

Summary

https://youtu.be/xLVkao1b6Dk
Featured here at 2:10

This game really suffered from people not submitting actions for some reason. I’m not sure why that was but it was disappointing. Hippo threw with a bad vote though.

Midnight Bride

Summary

https://youtu.be/fxh86ETTVcU
As seen here from 7:13

Jane could have done more. If she wanted to pick a ‘Good’ husband, she could have picked one that wasn’t the complete opposite of all the bad husbands.

The Wolf and the Nut

Summary

https://youtu.be/SDKpjhCz_Bk
12:00

Alice was robbed. No hope of influencing people once they realised it was RNG.

Forbidden Chambers

Summary

https://youtu.be/MYdnH_8YILU
17:30

Disappointed that App basically killed Wim for this game by not acting.

Fight for freedom
(Watch the end of any clip except the last for the version I used)

I nearly ran out of things to ask. Appel nearly won it. Lol.

All in all, I feel I did a good job recreating these games, but there are some issues to iron out. The question is, would it be worth it?

Read full topic
item.source: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free

item.title: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
" Welcome to the fight for freedom. I will ask you questions about your time in the tower. Answer them quickly within time and take a step closer to freedom. Run out of time or answer incorrectly your opponent takes the step. Appelsini will start. What was the name of the game played on floor 5?"

"Too Slow. It was Midnight Bride. PKR - Take a step closer to freedom. What was the name of the one in charge of ceremonies on floor 5?"

Pkr: “Counsellor”

“Incorrect. It wad marriage man. Appel take a step towards the key. Were more saboteurs detected or avoid detection?”

Appel: “Detected”

"Correct. They were detected. Take a step towards the key. Pkr - How many invites were found on floor 6?"

Pkr: 7

"Incorrect. It was 8. Appel, take a step towards the key. Appel - answer this correctly and you win your freedom. Who was trapped on floor 7?"

Appel: Alice?

“Incorrect. It was Wazza. Pkr take a step towards the key. Pkr, you must answer this correctly or Appel wins. Who was the saboteur on floor 6?”

Pkr: Hippo

"Correct. It was Hippo. We now enter sudden death. Appel - Who was the saboteur the most?"

Appel: Apprentice.

"Correct. Pkr - Other than you, name a player who was never the saboteur?"

Pkr: Appel

"Correct. Appel - How many presents were opened on floor 8?"

Appel: 6

"Correct. Pkr - "What was the name of the game on floor 7?"

Pkr: Frozen Princess

“Correct. Appel - What game was played on floor 4?”

Appel: Letters?

“Incorrect. It was 'The wolf and the nut. Pkr - answer correctly and you have won. Who was the companion that helped you on floor 4?"”

Pkr: Miss Scarlet

“Correct. Pkr. You have won. Poor unfortunate @Appelsiini. You’re trapped! @pokemonkidryan take the key and leave this place before I change my mind…”

“Yeah, get out of here. You smell funny anyway. Pfft. You had better go to… Unless you wanna be… Trapped?!”

Read full topic
item.source: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free

item.title: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
"Pkr, who do you think it was?"

On another topic

I think the Saboteur is Apprentice because he took up the yellow room and refused to move

“You have voted for @Apprentice. The saboteur was in fact @Apprentice.”

“Apprentice, although you sabotaged the challenge you were detected. Therefore, you will not be leaving this room.”

“Poor unfortunate Apprentice, you’re trapped!”

Bong

“Floor 2. The fight for freedom”

This game will occur via Discord.

Read full topic

item.title: Misc: Trapped - Game over. PKR is free
item.dc:creator: Apprentice
item.description:
I think Saboteur was PKR. I think Appel was aggressive about accusing me and PKR just kinda sheeped it although I don’t really have anything else to go off of. The reason that the boxes makes zero sense for me as Saboteur is because it makes it 100% impossible for me to lie. In a 3/2 split the Saboteur can lie about which color they take, but since I have all of the boxes it makes it impossible for me to mess with things and lie.

Read full topic
